Text:
Thanks :P !!!

can you do the other (classic) western's too ???


great job !

The other two westerns belonging to "The Man with No Name Trilogy" were already encoded by Kingdom-Release in BRRip quality. 

I don't see the point of doing again "A Fistful of Dollars" and "The Good the Bad and the Ugly". 

Use the search function. :)

I don't think there is a blu ray version of :  "my name is nobody "

imdb.com/title/tt0070215

"My Name Is Nobody" had a limited Blu-Ray release (only Italian audio I think and not yet in major resellers catalogues, Amazon for instance). Maybe that's the reason it's not been encoded by the Scene or a P2P group yet.

Info link:  http://forum.blu-ray.com/italy/137906-my-name-nobody-il-mio-nome-e-nessuno-terence-hill.html 

I've found a 720p encode with a low bitrate in a private tracker but it's not a source good enough for me to encode from (I need 1080p at least). 

I might do it in the future. :)

It is just great quality
v 11/10
A 11/10

Thanks
Thanks man for da classic masterpiece +1

Audio 10/10
Video 10/10

however there is something i can't deal with, it's the sync. it's a bit laggy between audio and footage. I face the same issue many times. it would be appreciated if anyone one let me know what to do, and what's the reason for this.

Please take in consideration i'm a newbie. Thanks
